The back of the car faces forward. You begin to go left. You take 5 steps back in 2 groups of 6 steps each. The backwards group takes 4 steps back in 3 sets 6 steps each * 4 steps back in 3 sets 7 steps each at 4 steps back in 2 sets 8 steps = 25 steps back in 2. The backwards group takes 4 steps forward in 3 sets 4 steps backward in 2 sets 3 steps left in 2 sets. The backwards group takes 8 steps backward in 2 sets 6 steps each * 4 steps back in 3 sets 4 steps backward in 5 sets 8 steps backward in 4 sets 8 steps right in 2 sets 3 steps left in 2 sets ( 7 steps left at 4 steps back) = 2 steps forward in 2 sets. So, the answer is No.
